about_the_game:
The Forbidden Fantasies DLC is an opportunity to expand your connection with Lust Academy characters and get more satisfying visual content with them.
The Forbidden Fantasies DLC has additional content to help you navigate through the game, get to know your favorite characters better, and enjoy more renders and artwork.
The DLC includes:
  • Character diaries - There's no better way to get to know a character closer than to look at her diary. Find out what occupies their thoughts through their time at Cordale.
  • Character BIOs - A set of lovely designed BIO cards for you to learn more about the origins of the beloved characters.
  • Lustagram app picture set - Pictures from the Lustagram game app allow you to enjoy engaging and tempting pictures our girls and boys take for their go-to social media.
  • Walkthrough Guide - A guide to the game includes tips on love storylines and the most effective ways to earn money.

Buy the Forbidden Fantasies DLC and enjoy it all now!
DLC Can be found in the root folder of the game
